alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chemung; Chenango; Otsego; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 02 at 10:40PM EST until February 04 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THURSDAY TO 3 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 12 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Otsego, Chenango, Chemung, Tioga and Broome counties. * WHEN...From 9 AM Thursday to 3 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light mixed precipitation will move into the region tonight and Thursday morning. The main round of snow is expected Thursday afternoon and night with lingering lighter snow Friday. Some sleet may mix in at times, lowering snow totals in a few spots.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
